document.docAuthor: Huber, John T., Read, Jennifer D. & Triapitsyn, Serguei V.
document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

bibRefCitation.author: Ward, A. O.
bibRefCitation.refString: Ward, A. O. (1875) Description of a new species of Proctotrypidae from Ceylon. Entomologist's Monthly Magazine, 11, 197.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Mymar taprobanicus Ward, 1875: 197
. Lectotype (NHMUK?), lost. TL: Sri Lanka , locality not specified [but sent to England from Colombo].
Westwood, 1879: 585
(description) [P].

Mymar antillanum Dozier, 1937: 130
. Holotype ♀ (USNM). TL: Puerto Rico , near Boquerón. Synonymy by
Annecke, 1961a: 547
.

Mymar indica Mani, 1942: 160
. Holotype ♂ (INPC). TL: India , Delhi . Synonymy by
Hayat, 1977: 283
.

Mymar tyndalli Girault 1912
[120]: 168. Holotype ♀ (QM). TL: Australia , Queensland , Nelson. Synonymy by
Annecke, 1961a: 547
.

Oglobliniella aegyptiaca Soyka, 1950b: 131
. Holotype ♀ (PPDD), lost. TL: Egypt , Giza . Synonymy by
Annecke, 1961a: 547
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . USA : FL, GA, MD, MO, NC, SC, VA.
